titleStmt.title: John Boyle to R. C. Hewitt
CWG14125

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Assistant Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 1 ; 5 Sept 1863 - 2 Feb 1864

body.p:
8
Sept 8 3
Dr R. C. Hewitt
Chm. Med Board
Louisville Ky
Dear Sir

Your Board will please examine Dr E. W. Woodson of Paducah Ky touching his qualification for the post of Surgeon or Assistant Surgeon: he having produced to the Governor satisfactory proof of the loyalty and good moral character

By order of the Governor
John Boyle
Adjt Genl Ky vols
